positive.headline: In pictures: King Charles and Queen Camilla welcomed in Ottawa
positive.summary: The two - day visit is meant to underscore Canada 's sovereignty in the face of tensions with the Us . It comes ahead of a big day on Tuesday , when the King will deliver the Speech of the Throne . A monarch has not delivered the throne speech in Canada since 1977 . The visit comes amid a trade war with the country 's neighbour and close economic ally .

positive.headline: Watch: Push in the face by wife was joke not domestic dispute, says Macron
positive.summary: Footage shows the moment Emmanuel Macron is shoved in the face by his wife . In the clip , Brigitte Macron is largely obscured from view as she pushes Macron . He appears startled but quickly composes himself and waves to cameras below .

positive.headline: An inside look at how the Internet Archive saves the web
positive.summary: The internet archive gathers billions of web pages in a huge digital archiving project to preserve our internet history from being erased . It also stores and catalogues millions of books , records and videos from around the world . At the 2025 Venice Architecture Biennale , curator Carlo Ratti asks : can design help us adapt to a changing world ?

positive.headline: Humanoid robots fight in Chinese kick-boxing competition
positive.summary: Two humanoid robots traded punches in a competition held in Hangzhou , China . The event was part of the China Media group World Robot competition . A volcano on the Negros island spewed plumes of ash around 3 km high into the air .

positive.headline: The 'Big Four' reunite for Nadal at Roland Garros
positive.summary: Andy Murray , Roger Federer and Novak Djokovic pay tribute to Rafael Nadal at Roland garros . The british no 1 was a great tennis player and an all - time great . Click here for more tennis news .

positive.headline: Why King Charles III's trip to Canada is more than just a royal visit
positive.summary: Queen elizabeth will open parliament in Canada on Thursday . Two people killed and at least 19 others injured after a tall Mexican navy training sailboat crashed into New York City 's Brooklyn bridge . One of the world 's most active volcanoes has erupted again in Hawaii .

positive.headline: 'It's been so special' - Lineker's final Match of the Day sign-off
positive.summary: Gary lineker signs off his final match of the day appearance . Thanks his colleagues and viewers after more than 25 years presenting the show . The bbc is not responsible for the content of external sites . Click here to watch lineker sign off .

positive.headline: 9 family trips to take in the US this year
positive.summary: This list for 2025 includes magical destinations that are also offering something new right now . From newly launched initiatives to unexpectedly fun experiences , all these places offer much more than just a holiday . The list was compiled by journalist and family travel expert , who has travelled to 40 countries and 49 states .

positive.headline: King and Queen arrive in Canada for historic visit
positive.summary: Prime minister Mark Carney met the royal couple on the airport runway in Ottawa . It is the start of a two - day visit to Canada seen as a message of support for the country . The King and queen will deliver a " speech from the throne " to Canada 's parliament .

positive.headline: Trump lays wreath at Arlington cemetery ceremony
positive.summary: Two people killed and at least 19 others injured after a tall Mexican navy training sailboat crashed into New York City 's Brooklyn bridge . The prosecution wrapped up its questioning of Ventura , who will return to the stand on Thursday for cross - examination by Combs ' lawyers . Pope Leo xIV 's brother Louis says nothing will be the same again after his appointment .

positive.headline: Ex-DR Congo president returns from self-imposed exile, party says
positive.summary: Former Drc president has arrived in rebel - held eastern city of Goma , rebels say . A youth leader for Kabila 's party says he should be allowed full access to the country . The 53 - year - old has been accused of war crimes and treason by the authorities .

positive.headline: Man Utd close to signing Wolves' Cunha
positive.summary: Matheus cunha has scored 15 goals in 33 premier league appearances this season . The 25 - year - old will be paid the full fee in three instalments over a two - year period . Sources indicate a deal over personal terms is now a formality .

positive.headline: Sinner overcomes late wobble to progress in Paris
positive.summary: Jannik Sinner beats resurgent frenchman 6 - 4 6 - 3 7 - 5 on court Philippe chatrier . It is Italian 's first grand slam match since serving a three - month doping ban . The 23 - year - old fights back from a double break down in the third set .

positive.headline: Brazil 'best team in the world' - new boss Ancelotti
positive.summary: Former real madrid manager unveiled as new boss of the brazilian national team . Ancelotti has won the champions league on three occasions and the La liga title twice . The 65 - year - old has been in charge of the spanish giants for the past four years . His first games with the team are two south american World Cup qualifiers .

positive.headline: It's the Doctor Who and The Last of Us finales: What's coming up this week
positive.summary: Fans will be desperate to find out how the Doctor survives in the finale . There 's been media talk that ncuti gatwa might be leaving the show . The reality war is on BBC one ( disney+ internationally ) on Saturday .

positive.headline: Should children at nursery have screen time?
positive.summary: The world health organization recommends that children under five spend no more than one hour a day looking at a screen . The issue divides children , parents and educators . In West Belfast , nursery schools have been working together to identify trends nurseries are experiencing with how ready children are for school .

positive.headline: 'You'd wish you were dead': Exploring the smells of outer space
positive.summary: The largest planet in the solar system , Jupiter , has several layers of cloud . Each layer has a different chemical composition . Astrobiology PhD student Marina barcenilla has designed scents recreating the odour of outer space for the natural history museum .

positive.headline: Lilo and Stitch beat Tom Cruise in box office bonanza
positive.summary: Lilo and stitch surpasses expectations with $ 341 m ( £ 252 m ) at the box office . Mission : impossible - the final reckoning also proves a hit with $ 190 m sales . But some have doubts about whether it will really turn out to be the end of the series .

positive.headline: Iranian director speaks out after Cannes triumph
positive.summary: Director Jafar panahi has won the top prize at the Cannes film festival . His film it was just an accident was described as a " furious but funny revenge thriller " he has previously been jailed for protesting against the detention of fellow film - makers .

positive.headline: India's colonial past revealed through 200 masterful paintings
positive.summary: A Treasury of life : Indian Company Paintings , C. 1790 to 1835 , is an ongoing show in the Indian capital . Over 200 works that once lay on the margins of mainstream art history are on display . The paintings were painted by largely unnamed artists and cover a wide range of subjects .

positive.headline: Why this iconic 1839 painting is so misunderstood
positive.summary: " the fighting temeraire " depicts a 98 - gun warship of the british Navy . It caught the nation 's attention in 1838 when it was dismantled and its parts sold off . Popular view is that the painting evokes nostalgia and a sense of faded national glory . But the painting 's true message is that it is about the tugboat , not the warship .

positive.headline: The 'forgotten Monet' finally getting her moment
positive.summary: A new exhibition and monograph – the artist 's first in English – seeks to restore her reputation . The exhibition at the sidney and Lois Eskenazi Museum of Art , in Indiana , brings together 40 of her paintings , along with sketchbooks , photographs and letters . Few of her 300 - ish works are in public collections , and in the Us , only one .

positive.headline: Life-sized animal puppets to stampede across London
positive.summary: The HERDS will make their way to London from 27 to 29 June . They will visit Somerset house , Coram 's fields , Camden high street and Stratford . The animals began their stampede on 9 April in Kinshasa , the democratic republic of Congo .

positive.headline: The rare 'blue ghosts' of North Carolina
positive.summary: Blue ghost fireflies are a rare species of Bioluminescent beetle that can only be found in the southern appalachian mountains . This year , the glow carries an added meaning : in September 2024 , the remnants of hurricane Helene tore through the region . Locals hope that this year 's firefly season can help put the city back on the map .

positive.headline: The sounds and songs of Iceland's melting landscape
positive.summary: Scientists estimate Iceland 's glaciers could lose half their volume by 2100 . Percussionist konstantine vlasis hopes that sound can help people understand this environmental shift . His PhD explores how sounds of glaciers can reveal what we might miss with our eyes alone .

positive.headline: Africa's ice cream cafe that nurtures self-esteem
positive.summary: Tapi tapi is an ice cream cafe in Cape town , South Africa . The cafe aims to rehabilitate the collective self - esteem of african people . All its flavours are handmade in small batches with ingredients communally sourced .

positive.headline: How Dubai chocolate sparked a global frenzy
positive.summary: Original " ca n't get knafeh of it " chocolate was launched by FIX in 2022 . A video of a woman trying the bar went viral , attracting more than 125 million views . Independent chocolatiers and multinational brands have copied the bar to meet demand .

positive.headline: The artichoke so prized that people sell fakes
positive.summary: The violet artichoke is a rare flower that grows only 10 days a year in the lagoon . The tiny artichokes , half the size of a human palm , are highly prized for their rarity . A local delicacy known as a castraùra can be eaten raw or cooked .

positive.headline: Expert urges calm over mosquito disease found in UK
positive.summary: Virologist says mosquito - borne diseases are " likely " to increase in range . Prof Jonathan ball said climate change meant tropical viral diseases would become more established further north . There have been no human cases of locally - acquired west Nile virus in the UK to date .

positive.headline: 'Maybe Venice is the city that can save the world'
positive.summary: The 2025 Venice Architecture Biennale invites artists , architects , and audiences to re - imagine the future . Journalist Lily jamali heads behind the scenes of the non - profit organisation in San Francisco . The travel show discusses the importance of historically black colleges and universities in the Us .

positive.headline: Inside the lab where baby sharks are born
positive.summary: Incubating system replicates a mother shark 's womb , where they can move unborn sharks whose mothers have been killed accidentally in fishing nets . At the 2025 Venice Architecture Biennale , curator Carlo Ratti asks : can design help us adapt to a changing world ? The travel show discusses the importance of historically black colleges and universities in the Us .

positive.headline: Watch the improbable comeback of the white tern
positive.summary: The white tern population was nearly decimated in Honolulu but ironically its busy roads and planted trees are now helping them make a comeback . The travel show discusses the importance of historically black colleges and universities in the Us . Investment strategist Guy Lebas says the tax bill passed by the house has good and bad impacts on growth .

positive.headline: Subscribe to Future Earth
positive.summary: Every tuesday from a global cast of climate correspondents , direct to your inbox . Cnn 's Kat kinsman takes a look at some of the world 's most pressing climate issues .

positive.headline: Download the BBC app
positive.summary: The BBC app is your go - to source to stay informed , engaged , and connected . Download the app from the app store for iphone , iPad , and iPod touch . Stay plugged into live news updates and global sports coverage .

positive.headline: Sign up for the Essential List
positive.summary: Discover handpicked features , videos , and can’t - miss news from our editors . Cnn . Subscribe to our free newsletter to stay up - to - date with the latest news .

positive.headline:
Trending
New Orleans inmates
positive.summary: Seven people have been charged with helping the escapees . Five of the 10 inmates who broke out of a new Orleans jail have been captured . Investigators believe other inmates provided materials used during the escape .

positive.headline: Lorde-themed club night
positive.summary: The singer turned up to a -themed club night at a Sydney venue . Whispers began to circulate that she might attend because her security had done a walkthrough . The crowd had no such warning , however , and only realized the singer was there when she began interacting with them .

positive.headline: Trump EPA drafting a rule that would undo decades of progress on limiting pollution from power plants
positive.summary: Proposed rule would undo decades of progress on limiting us climate pollution . It is a sharp reversal from the biden administrationâs policies . Power plants are the second - biggest emitters of planet - warming pollution in the Us .

positive.headline: Demi Lovato and Jordan âJutesâ Lutes are married
positive.summary: The singer and actress tied the knot with songwriter and recording artist , Jordan âJutesâ Lutes , on Sunday in California . She wore a white gown designed by vivienne Westwood . The gown was created over the course of five fittings in Los Angeles .

positive.headline: So what happens to Americaâs 114 billion pennies once the US stops making them?
positive.summary: The one - cent coin will still remain legal tender , and will still be in use at thousands of retailers around the country for sometime to come . There are an estimated 114 billion pennies currently in circulation , but they are âseverely underutilizedâ according to the Treasury department . The math says that all those pennies could fill a cube roughly 13 stories high .

positive.headline: Trump delays 50% tariffs on the EU
positive.summary: ' ( Von Der Leyen ) said she wants to get down to serious negotiation , ' he said . ' i agreed to do that , ' he told reporters at the airport in New Jersey . As recently as Friday , Trump said he was with the EU , and that their tariff rate was set at 50 % and would go into effect on June 1 .

positive.headline: The first lady says AI is the future of publishing. Itâs already happening
positive.summary: First lady 's book will be narrated by an AI - generated copy of her voice . Experts say using AI for voiceover work is becoming common . ' it 's too reductive to say , yes , thatâs an inevitable cut in the number of jobs , Â said one expert .

positive.headline: âThe Last of Usâ Season 2: What happened in the nail-biter finale
positive.summary: âthe last of Usâ concluded its emotional second season with a major cliffhanger . A deadly reunion between Abby ( Kaitlyn dever ) and Ellie culminated in the death of Jesse ( Youngmazino ) Jesse was killed during a confrontation inside the theater .

positive.headline: âStitchpossibleâ kicks off summer with record box office for Memorial Day weekend
positive.summary: âLilo & Stitchâ grossed roughly $ 145 . 5 million domestically Friday through Sunday . It is expected to be the highest - grossing opening for the holiday weekend , likely edging the 2022 release of paramountâs ' Top Gun maverick ' ' ' mission : impossibleâ the final reckoning ' grossed about $ 63 million in domestic sales through Sunday , surpassing projections of $ 60 million .

positive.headline: Whatâs so special about orange cats? Turns out theyâre freaks of nature
positive.summary: The genetic code for Orange Color is carried on the x chromosome . The vast majority of fully orange cats are male . Any male cat carrying the Orange Trait will be entirely orange . Most female cats with orange fur have patchy patterns â calico or tortoiseshell . A genetic variant has not been found in any other animal .

positive.headline: Galaxies battle in âcosmic joustâ witnessed by astronomers for the first time
positive.summary: Two galaxies in the throes of a deep - space ' duel ' one repeatedly wielded its intense beams of radiation at the other , dispersing gas clouds and weakening its opponentâs ability to form new stars . Findings provide a rare look into earlier times in the universe , when star formation and galaxy mergers were more common .

positive.headline: Hikers stumble across treasure hidden on a mountain trail, sparking an investigation into its origin
positive.summary: Two hikers found an aluminum box sticking out of a stony wall in the Krkonoe mountains . They immediately took it to the Museum of Eastern Bohemia , in the nearby town of Hradec Krlov . The stash ca n't be more than about a century old , because one of the coins is dated 1921 .

positive.headline: The No. 1 beach in the US isnât in Florida or Hawaii
positive.summary: The beach , located in the swanky Hamptons , ranked no . 2 last year , behind Hawaiiâs Duke Kahanamoku Beach on Oahu . Criteria include the presence of algae , the prevalence of rip tides and the cleanliness of the beach .

positive.headline: All the surprising, subversive and rule-breaking looks from Cannes Film Festival
positive.summary: This year , the fashion stakes were upped before the festival even opened its doors . Nudity was explicitly banned , as were âvoluminous outfitsâ with large trains for the sake of traffic control . Some stars , like Halle Berry , dutifully obeyed the rules , while others brazenly persevered with their original wardrobe plans .

positive.headline: Rest days arenât optional â theyâre where the real progress happens
positive.summary: Rest is when your body repairs tissues , replenishes energy stores and rebalances nervous system activity . The effort you put into recovery directly correlates with the effectiveness of your training . Even one single night of sleep deprivation in healthy young adults elevates cortisol levels .

positive.headline: Kermit the Frogâs advice to 2025 grads
positive.summary: “ the office ” star teamed up with a nonprofit to offer free prom tickets to students impacted by the blaze . A mini pony escaped from a rescue farm and where she ended up next is pretty heartwarming . Plus , “ the golden girls ” reboot no one saw coming – and this time , they ’ve got shells and siblings .

positive.headline: How safe is it to fly right now?
positive.summary: As us travelers gear up for memorial day , one question is on many people ’s minds : is it safe to fly right now ? He 's CNN ’s aviation and transportation correspondent – and a pilot himself . The transcripts are made available as soon as possible . They are not fully edited for grammar or spelling and may be revised in the future .

positive.headline: How to become a super ager
positive.summary: Cardiologist explains why preventing the onset of major diseases is key to extending your life and health - span . He also shares the new screening tools that might help us do it . Transcripts are made available as soon as possible . They are not edited for grammar or spelling .

positive.headline: Knicks set a new NBA playoff record after comeback win in Indiana
positive.summary: The Knicks erased a 20 - point second - quarter hole to beat the Pacers 106 - 100 on Sunday . They went on a 16 - 4 run to get within striking distance late in the third quarter . A fantastic stretch from Karl - Anthony Towns helped New York take the lead early in the fourth .

positive.headline: Ross Chastain makes NASCAR history for the first time since 1969
positive.summary: Ross chastain won the NASCAR Coca - Cola 600 at Charlotte motor speedway . He edged out stage winner William Byron by just 0 . 673 seconds in a thrilling finish . Kyle Larson has claimed two of the last four cup series victories .

positive.headline: Falling asleep to your favorite show doesnât have to ruin your sleep, experts say
positive.summary: More than half of people with sleep disturbances use music as a sleep aid . It is recommended that adults obtain at least 7 hours of sleep regularly for optimal performance . A predictable kind of noise can help tell your body itâs time to wind down .
entities: Saint Louis University School of Medicine

positive.headline: Gallery The week in 35 photos
positive.summary: The ship , cuauhtmoc , was carrying 277 people when it struck the bridge . There was no visible damage to the bridge , which only temporarily closed . The Ntsb is investigating the cause of the incident .

positive.summary: Sudoku meets blocks in this addictive tile - matching puzzle . 2025 cable news network . A Warner Bros. Discovery company . Network . Click here for more Cnn content .

Gomez was inspired by a cold , sweetened drink often made from ground rice or nuts and flavored with Cinnamon .

positive.headline: Pope prays for Chinese Catholics, hinting at how he will approach one of the Churchâs thorniest issues
positive.summary: Historyâs first American Pope recalled that on Saturday the Catholic Church marked a special feast day to pray for the church in China . Leo noted that on the feast day Âin the churches and shrines in China and throughout the world , prayers have been raised to Godâ .

positive.headline: The Guardian view
positive.summary: All Guardian and observer editorials can be found here . A list of the day 's top stories can be read here - or click here for all the latest . The daily mail 's Ed miliband explains why he thinks gay marriage is ' strange '.

positive.headline: Germany and Ukraine’s other allies scrap range limits on arms sent to Kyiv
positive.summary: ' there are no longer any range restrictions on weapons delivered to Ukraine , ' says german Chancellor . Germany , the Uk , France and the U. S. Have lifted the restrictions . ' this means that Ukraine can now defend itself , for example , by attacking military positions in , ' he said .

positive.headline: ‘My mother didn’t try to stab my father until I was six’: Alan Alda on childhood, marriage and 60 years of stardom
positive.summary: Lan alda is back topping the charts with an update of his 1981 movie the four seasons . He wrote , directed and starred in the movie about three inseparable couples who holiday together every quarter until divorce , envy and angst intervene . At the time of writing , it is the fourth most watched show on Netflix .

positive.headline: No meat, no beer and hopefully no poison: the curious tale of Hitler’s food tasters
positive.summary: The tasters is based on a 2018 italian historical fiction novel by Rosella Postorino , translated into English as at the wolfâs table . Director Silvio soldini said he approached the material as rooted in fact and liked that it turned a spotlight on to a rare women - centred narrative in the still booming market for films about the second world war and the Holocaust .

positive.headline: World Club Cup launch tosses away decades of European rugby history
positive.summary: Retaining an element of familiarity is crucial in sport . Never before has the biggest trophy in club rugby ended up in the hands of a team who did not even exist before 2006 . England and Scotland have been unable to compete in the same way . It is time for the rbs to reassess its approach to club rugby .

positive.headline: The CrosswordGet clued in with wordplay, every day.
positive.summary: Since the launch of the crossword in 1942 , the times has captivated solvers by providing engaging word and logic games . In 2014 , we introduced the mini crossword Â followed by Spelling Bee , letter boxed , tiles , wordle , connections and more .

positive.headline: Trump wants Netanyahu to be on same page on Iran: Top US official
positive.summary: U. S. Secretary of homeland security says she delivered a message from president to Israeli prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu . Her comments come days after US and Iranian officials held their of nuclear talks in Rome . Last week , CNN said that Israel was preparing for strikes against Iran 's nuclear facilities , despite the US - led talks .

positive.headline: Lamine Yamal: Barcelona star inspiring next-gen footballers in his hometown
positive.summary: Lamine Yamal is expected to renew his contract with Barcelona before he turns 18 in July . The 17 - year - old winger helped barca clinch the La Liga title this season . Yamal grew up in a poor area of Mataro , a working - class neighbourhood of mataro .

positive.headline: ECB’s Lagarde says euro could be viable alternative to US dollar
positive.summary: Lagarde said the ongoing changes create the opening for a ‘ global euro moment ’ . Any enhanced role for the euro must coincide with greater military strength . The dollar ’s role has been on the decline for years and now makes up 58 percent of international reserves .

positive.headline: Parliament is returning after nearly 6 months away — and will look different
positive.summary: Parliament will return on Monday after nearly six months away . Electing a Speaker of the House of Commons should be the first order of business . A throne speech and the arrival of king Charles will add some flair .

positive.headline: Liberal MP Francis Scarpaleggia elected new Speaker of the House of Commons
positive.summary: The Speaker is an MP chosen in a secret ranked ballot by other MPs . The role is considered non - partisan . Prime Minister Mark Carney says he has much to learn . " we will prevail . We are in the golden age of Athens , " he says .

neutral.headline: Police to give update after car ploughs into crowd at Liverpool FC parade
neutral.summary: Merseyside police are due to provide an update to the media after a car drove into pedestrians in . Police did not specify if he was the suspected driver . It is not yet clear how many people have been injured , or to what extent . Prime minister says what has happened in Liverpool is " appalling ".

neutral.headline: Kremlin calls Trump 'emotional' after US president says Putin is 'crazy'
neutral.summary: Trump said on truth social on Sunday that " something has happened " to Putin . At least 13 people were killed and dozens injured in Ukraine with 367 drones and missiles . Russia 's spokesman said the comments were " connected to an emotional overload " german chancellor said there were " no longer " range restrictions on arms supplied to Ukraine .

neutral.headline: Rushdie 'pleased' with attacker's maximum sentence
neutral.summary: " i was pleased that he got the maximum available , " says author Sir Salman Rushdie . Hadi matar repeatedly stabbed the writer on a lecture stage in 2022 . The attack left the award - winning writer blind in one eye and paralysed in his hand .

neutral.headline: Should you ever cut ties with your parents?
neutral.summary: There 's relatively little research on estrangement , says psychologist . 26 % of people in the U. S. Had periods of estrangements from their father and 6 % from their mother . Estranged parents are more likely to be alcoholics than non - alcoholics . A third of people who break up with their parents are unhappy .

neutral.headline: The first men to conquer Everest's 'death zone'
neutral.summary: " death zone " refers to the altitude that climbers reach on the mountain . The thinness of the atmosphere means that mountaineers suffer hypoxia . Most climbers who have died on Everest have met their end in the death zone .

neutral.headline: Fake discounts on Shein 'breach law', EU says
neutral.summary: The European Union has given shein one month to respond to its findings . The fast - fashion website has come under fire for its business practices before . A shein spokesperson said it has been working constructively with national authorities . " it 's now for shein to step up , respect the rules , " said the EU Justice commissioner .

neutral.headline: Scene after car hits pedestrians in Liverpool
neutral.summary: A 53 - year - old white man has been arrested after a car drove into pedestrians in Liverpool . Police did not say whether the man is the suspected driver . Reform 's newest MP Sarah pochin promises to give a voice to the people of runcorn and helsby .

neutral.headline: Thousands remember George Floyd on fifth anniversary of death
neutral.summary: The anniversary of the death of black man by police is marked across the country . In the city where he grew up and is buried , his family gathers for a service led by the Rev . Al Sharpton . " now is the time for the people to rise up and continue the good work we started , " his aunt says . Protests against police brutality and racism continue in the wake of the killing .

neutral.headline: Head of controversial Israel-backed Gaza aid group resigns
neutral.summary: Jake wood quits the Gaza humanitarian foundation late on Sunday . He said it would not be able to fulfil the principles of " humanity , neutrality , impartiality , and independence " the plan , also backed by the Us , will have private contractors delivering aid . It was criticised by the UN , which says it will not participate .

neutral.headline: Trump agrees to extend EU trade talks after 50% tariff threat
neutral.summary: Last month , he announced a 20 % tariff - or import tax - on most EU goods . But he later cut this to 10 % to allow time for negotiations . He expressed frustration with the pace of talks and threatened to raise the tariff rate to an even higher level of 50 % .

neutral.headline: Rate 'rigging' traders say they were scapegoated - now the Supreme Court will decide
neutral.summary: Two former city traders jailed for rigging interest rates are appealing to Supreme Court . If successful , it could lead to the quashing of all remaining convictions secured in nine criminal trials . Concerns raised by senior politicians that there may have been a series of miscarriages of justice .

neutral.headline: Analysis: Trump's tariff plans could spark global economic shock
neutral.summary: The resumption of the global trade war by Donald Trump comes after a period of relative calm . It indicates significant volatility in the coming weeks , ahead of a crucial G7 summit . Many in the EU , and other countries such as Japan , believe the US administration is bluffing .

neutral.headline: Lineker says emotional farewell on final Match of the Day
neutral.summary: Former england striker signs off from final edition of match of the day . Lineker announced in November he would leave the show at the end of the season . He had been due to remain for coverage of the men 's FA cup and world Cup . Presenter presented with a commemorative cap and golden boot .

neutral.headline: The flawless biscuit that took years to master
neutral.summary: Grammy- and Pulitzer Prize - winning musician found herself craving biscuits in 2020 . Her pandemic baking obsession even inspired her new music festival . The festival showcases the similarly winding journeys of black music and food .

neutral.headline: The Soviet nuclear plan to reverse Siberian rivers
neutral.summary: Nuclear lake was formed in 1971 when the Soviet Union simultaneously fired three nuclear devices buried 127 m ( 417 ft ) underground . The experiment , codenamed " taiga " , was part of a two - decade long Soviet programme of carrying out ( PNEs ) the blasts were supposed to help excavate a massive canal to connect the basin of the Pechora River .

neutral.headline: Tensions rise as superpowers scrap for a piece of the Arctic
neutral.summary: The Arctic is fast becoming one of the most hotly - contested parts of the world . China is vying to buy real estate , get involved in infrastructure projects and establish a permanent regional presence . Global powers see a new world of opportunities opening up in the Arctic on the back of environmental changes .

' each such terrorist attack by Russia is a sufficient reason for new sanctions against Russia , ' said President Volodymyr Zelensky .

Brown snapped to attention with a hearty , âyessir ! â he would go on to break the navy 's color barrier . His life would inspire a bestselling and .

neutral.headline: Man arrested after car plows into pedestrians during Liverpool Football Clubâs victory parade
neutral.summary: 53 - year - old white man from the Liverpool area has been arrested . Police were contacted just after 6 p. M. Local time after reports a car had been in collision with a number of pedestriansâ in the city center . The incident comes the same day the city was filled with soccer fans attending an open - top bus parade to celebrate Liverpool 's 20th top - flight league title .

neutral.headline: These items are more expensive this Memorial Day because of tariffs
neutral.summary: Small businesses that sell beer , fireworks and other summer staples told CNN they are grappling with higher costs amid new tariffs . Economists expect prices to rise from President Donald Trumpâs tariffs , but it 's true that not all items are seeing price increases â yet . negative.headline: Hezbollah holds firm in Lebanon’s municipal elections
negative.summary: Voting took place over , starting in Mount Lebanon – north of the capital , Beirut . The polls , initially set for 2022 , were delayed three times due to parliamentary elections , funding issues and the war with Israel . Candidates running on campaigns of political reform and opposition to the political establishment made inroads in some parts of the country .

negative.headline: Are Palestinian groups in Lebanon about to give up their weapons?
negative.summary: The lebanese state is attempting to take advantage of a period of weakness for the . It has the backing of regional and international powers to disarm all non - state actors . Palestinians in Lebanon do not have the legal right to work in a number of professions .

negative.headline: Five years on, why false claims persist that George Floyd died of overdose
negative.summary: Five years ago , a white police officer in the U. S. Killed a 46 - year - old black man during an arrest in Minneapolis . A video showed officer Derek Chauvin kneeling on for about as Floyd pleaded he could n't breathe . Rep. Marjorie greene recently revived her longstanding , long - debunked take that Chauvin did not cause death . Greene : that falsehood is central to calls for president Donald Trump to pardon Chauvin .

negative.headline: More than 95 percent of Gaza’s agricultural land unusable, UN warns
negative.summary: Less than five percent of the Gaza strip 's cropland is able to be cultivated , according to a joint assessment from the FAO and the unosat . The destruction of agricultural infrastructure amid Israel 's war on Gaza is " further deteriorating food production capacity and exacerbating the risk of famine " the findings follow the release of the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification ( IPC ) analysis earlier this month .

negative.headline: ‘Need answers’: Will Sri Lanka’s Tamils find war closure under Dissanayake?
negative.summary: Thousands of Tamils gathered on May 18 to mark 16 years since the end of Sri Lanka ’s brutal civil war in Mullivaikkal . This year ’s commemorations were the first to take place under the new government helmed by leftist Anura Kumara dissanayake . The Tamil community alleges that a genocide of civilians took place during the war ’s final stages .

negative.headline: Russia-Ukraine war updates: Moscow dismisses Trump’s criticism of attacks
negative.summary: U. S. President condemns russian strikes on Ukraine , calls Putin ' absolutely crazy ' Russia 's President Vladimir Putin says he 's ' shocked and appalled ' by the strikes . Russia says it has a ' zero tolerance ' approach to conflict .

negative.headline: The most dangerous weapon in South Asia is not nuclear
negative.summary: In the hands of Indian and pakistani media , every act of violence was scripted . Every casualty was politicised . The media constructed a national identity of moral power . It was a war of narratives , orchestrated in headlines , hashtags and nightly newsrooms .

negative.headline: Will King's visit help against Trump's 51st state threats?
negative.summary: " the king is the personification of the state , " a professor says . The king will deliver the throne speech that kicks off a new session of parliament . It 's only the third time the Canadian monarch has read the speech . U. S. President has threatened to annex Canada .

negative.headline: Girl, 5, survives fiery aftermath of deadly Israeli strike on Gaza City school shelter
negative.summary: " i was scared of the fire , " five - year - old girl tells Cnn after being rescued . " the whole school was burning up , " she says after being treated in hospital . Six of her siblings and their mother were killed in the overnight airstrike on the shelter . A paramedic says the rubble at the shelter was " scorching hot , and she was underneath ".

negative.headline: Duck Dynasty patriarch Phil Robertson dead at 79
negative.summary: Phil Robertson 's family announced in December that the patriarch of the clan had Alzheimer 's . " we are grateful for his life on earth , " his daughter - in - law says . He was the head of the family featured on the reality show , which ran for 11 seasons . His family says he " is a godly man ".

negative.headline: Putin 'needlessly killing a lot of people, ' Trump says, as Russia continues drone onslaught in Ukraine
negative.summary: A 14 - year - old boy is reported injured in the black sea region of odesa . The third consecutive night of Russian aerial attacks hit targets in five locations . U. S. President : " he is needlessly killing a lot of people " in comments on truth Social .

negative.headline: Trump drops tariff threat against EU after weekend call with bloc chief
negative.summary: The euro hits a one - month high against the dollar on Monday . U. S. And european trade representatives are due to hold talks on Monday . The call between the two leaders gave " new impetus " to trade talks , the EU says .
